name: Gardevior
specialText: When an opponent inflicts decreased movement speed or a damage-over-time condition on the Pokemon, the same is inflicted on that opponent. This Ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.
basicAttack: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect and decreases their SP. Def for a short time.

skills.name: Confusion
skills.effect: Attacks straight in the designated direction.

skills.name: Psychic
skills.effect: After hitting an opposing Pokemon or traveling its maximum distance, creates a circle that deals damage to opposing Pokemon in the area of effect, decreasing their movement speed for a short time

skills.name: Moonblast
skills.effect: Has the user attack while moving back to create distance. When this move's blast hits, it deals damage to opposing Pokemon in a cone and leaves the opposing Pokemon closest to the user unable to act for a short time

skills.name: Teleport
skills.effect: Has the user warp to the designated area, increasing the damage dealt by one basic attack after warping.

skills.name: Psyshock
skills.effect: Attacks three times in front of a user (AOE).
skills.upgrades: Increase the damage this move deals each time one of its attacks hits.

skills.name: Future Sight
skills.effect: Sets a delayed explosion. When the explosion hits an opposing Pokemon, it shortens this move's cooldown.

skills.name: Fairy Singularity
skills.effect: gGardevoir's Unite Move. Warps space in the designated area, drawing in opposing Pokemon. Shoves (knockback) and deals damage to opposing Pokemon the instant the warped space disappears.
